patterns_discovered.description: Adding aria-label attributes to icon-only buttons to improve screen reader accessibility
Using descriptive aria-labels following pattern 'Open [section] menu' for context menu triggers
IconButton components with only icon children (MoreVertIcon) that require aria-labels for accessibility

gotchas_discovered.context: Icon-only buttons without text content are not accessible to screen reader users without proper aria-label attributes
gotchas_discovered.resolution: Added descriptive aria-labels to both icon buttons

gotchas_discovered.issue: Multiple icon buttons of same type without differentiation
gotchas_discovered.context: Both IconButton instances use identical MoreVertIcon component, but require context-specific aria-labels
gotchas_discovered.resolution: Differentiated labels by section context: 'approvals' vs 'activity'

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully added aria-label attributes to all icon-only buttons in DashboardPage
approach_outcome.implementation_strategy: Direct attribute addition to existing IconButton components
approach_outcome.accessibility_improvement: Screen reader users can now understand the purpose of both menu trigger buttons
approach_outcome.testing_requirements: Visual regression testing recommended, accessibility audit verification

recommendations.recommendation: Establish a linting rule or ESLint plugin to enforce aria-labels on icon-only buttons
recommendations.rationale: Prevents future accessibility regressions for icon-only components

recommendations.recommendation: Document aria-label naming conventions for menu trigger buttons (e.g., 'Open [section] menu')
recommendations.rationale: Ensures consistency across the codebase for similar UI patterns

recommendations.recommendation: Conduct comprehensive accessibility scan of entire DashboardPage for other missing aria attributes
recommendations.rationale: This subtask targets only IconButtons; other elements may lack proper ARIA labels

recommendations.recommendation: Add automated accessibility tests using tools like axe-core or jest-axe
recommendations.rationale: Ensures accessibility improvements are maintained across future updates

recommendations.recommendation: Include accessibility checklist item for icon-only components in code review process
recommendations.rationale: Helps catch similar issues before they reach production
